name: Bounz (GriGames)
description:
Hello everyone,

I'm Tuncer from Turkey, an indie mobile game developer,
I have released Bounz, a minimalist and challenging one touch game.

Control :

  • Click and hold to move straight
  • Collect diamonds
  • Don't hit walls

Do not forget to make reviews and suggestions to help me improve this game!

Thanks to itch.io and all of you for giving this opportunity,

Available on GooglePlay : https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.grigames.bounz

Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/grigames
Twitter : https://www.twitter.com/grigames
Website : https://www.grigames.com
